summary: Travel up close astronauts as they repair the Hubble Space Telescope and soar above Venus and Mars whilst finding proof of new planets and the possibility of other life forming around distant stars.
cast: Leonard Nimoy|Roberta L. Bondar|Eric DeJong|Ronald J. Grabe|David C. Hilmers|Ulf D. Merbold|Stephen S. Oswald|William F. Readdy|Lyman Spitzer|Norman E. Thagard
director: Directors: Ben Burtt, Phyllis Ferguson | 2 more credits Â»
title: Destino: el espacio
